page.title: 01General Review of 05880201
page.content: The area has been inhabited since before Roman times with several place names of Saxon origin. The area is predominantly farmland with some salt marsh and tidal creek. The residential area is composed of two partrs , the established village of Mayland and the developing area of Maylandsea. The two are shortly to be known as The Maylands. The riverside plays an important part in the life of the residential area many originally moving from London specifically to sail. There are many one man businesses springing up in the area. The following topics are applicable to the area:-Attitudes; Arts & Crafts; Clubs; Communications; Ecology; Employment; Farming; Landscape; Recreation; Religion;Health; Housing; Industry;Transport; Population.
